website_summaries.verdict: Cushioning, lightweight feel, and breathability are some of the perks that the Pacer Next Cage has to offer. Whether for gym outfit or casual attire, it has a cute and versatile design that can fit the bill. It is among the running-inspired sneakers that are ready to show-off a fashion statement without compromising comfort. To put a cherry on top, it provides value for money.
pros: A lot of users have commended the undeniable on-feet comfort that the Puma Pacer Next Cage delivers
Like other Puma Classics, it has an attractive and cute design that has impressed many customers
Plenty of wearers are delighted about how lightweight the low-top Puma Pacer Next Cage is
It is among the Puma trainers that are available in beautiful colorways, which several purchasers are thrilled
According to some reviewers, the Pacer Next Cage by Puma offers sufficient foot breathability
It has a stylish design that some wearers receive compliments whenever they use it
Several users are satisfied with how cushiony this kind of Puma sneakers is
It is among the affordable Puma sneakers
cons: Some customers have complained that the Puma Pacer Next Cage has a narrow shoe opening, which makes it difficult for their foot to get in
It does not provide enough traction, which has caused some wearers to fall or slide easily
A few have questioned the sneaker’s quality and durability

customer_reviews.title: Nice but huge!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and comfortable shoe but the sizing is so off. Even labeled wrong. Definetely order 1 size or even 1,5 down. I wear size 8,5 US and the sizing was labeled 8,5 US but 41 EU. But that's wrong, 8,5 US is 39 EU size... The actuall shoe size was really big as 41 EU. As I used to live there and always weared 39EU. Anyway just order smaller ones and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Skyren

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you order an 11 m it might come to you in a mens size ; although it says 11m women's
customer_reviews.text: The product as a whole is fine, would have been five stars but I have ordered three times and instead of receiving a womens 11 I get mens. I have history with amazon and had not had this trouble before. Now Im never ordering the athletic shoes again. They are good with the returns as it is trouble free, I really wanted the product though. Disappointed!😕
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: BE WARY OF SIZING! (and maybe the seller)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Puma Black Bright Peach shoe in what I thought was a Women’s size 6. It was NOT a women’s size 6. I received a sneaker that was US size 6/ UK 5/ EUR 38/cm 24. Be wary if you’re purchasing this shoe in particular from the seller “SHOEBACCA” because it is not “Women’s sizing” although it’s listed under the “Women’s Pacer Next Cage”. I’ve purchased TWO other PUMA Women’s Pacer Cage under this listing and those other two colors ( one black and white, the other a light blue and white) were a Women’s size 6.(UK 3.5/EUR 36/cm 22.5)
customer_reviews.author: Claylady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and amazing love puma's shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the shoe's an comfortable to have on. They seem to be just a casual shoes fancey looking an awesome to have. I use a size 9.5 but orderd a size 10 but didn't have to the size you are is what I should use. In all this is still a awesome shoe to get an have to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for the First Shoe / 1 Star for the second.
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this sneaker a 3 star because I'm averaging the two pairs that I purchased. The first pair I purchased in-store at a retailer and the shoe was amazing. They're incredibly comfortable so I wore them regularly until they were down to the nubs. My second pair which I purchased on Amazon fit much tighter (as if they were the wrong size), and the materials (toe/top of the shoe) started falling apart very quickly. If I had done the review on the first shoe only then I would give these a 5-star rating. I just purchased the THIRD pair so we'll see how they are when they arrive. This will be the determining factor.
customer_reviews.author: Bizz365

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are super comfy. They come in men sizes so just make sure you order the right size :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: They run very large, maybe possibly fake, but hard to tell.
customer_reviews.text: These almost looked like a men's 7 1/2 (but not quite as big). Its odd, They're labeled 7 1/2, but fit like maybe an 8 1/2. I ended up ordering from Puma site directly, so I think maybe these might be fake. I gave them to my daughter and she says they feel just like the ones I got. So, they're still good quality. Edit: I saw they changed the description as "Mens". They were listed as women's before, probably why there's a lot that say it runs large.
customer_reviews.author: Jack-Attack

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this seller and shoes
customer_reviews.text: Everything is accurate and true to size. I picked the size of an older set of Pumas I had and ordered these. Showed up quick, fast, and I’m a hurry and I love the shoes. I got exactly what I paid for and am very happy. I will be buying the same set in a different color this month.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Grandelli

customer_reviews.title: Runs very big but very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sneaker 3x's before I got the right fit. I normally wear a 9 and had to finally get the 8. Please size down at least a 1/2 size for this shoe to fit correctly. Other than that it was very comfortable and nice looking shoe. Also can take up to 10-14 days for seller to refund your money as Amazon does not refund it has to go through seller. So just something to note.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquetta Y.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good shoe but not a long lasting one.
customer_reviews.text: I use shoes at work and after three months they are beginning to peel of from the top. In contrast I had a pair of brooks since last september that I use to run 3 times a week 6 miles each time and they look better than these ones. I had a merrell shoe part that last it me 8 months. Maybe I've been spoiled but this shoe is around the same price and I expected it last a little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: TO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife, shes a size 6. When they arrived it said they were size 6. They are about size 9. The sizes are not accurate at all. Other than that, my wife liked them and she wanted to get a smaller size but they don't have any.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Size down!
customer_reviews.text: So I have wide 7 1/2 feet. Which truthfully you should go a size down than your normal with these because they’re made big, but they still fit me comfortably so I just didn’t care to deal with the hassle of returning them just to buy a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son. He loves them. They fit well, are comfortable and really look nice on. They are a step up from most sneakers in appearance. If they wear as well as his other Pumas we'll really be satisfied. He would recommend. He wears a 101/2 Med. These were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: P. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyyy too big.
customer_reviews.text: First I would have to say that I was very happy about the early delivery that was pretty amazing. The only thing I wasn’t happy with was the fact that it was wayyyy too large. Therefore I would say if you are a size 10 then get a 9.5. Other than the size issue it was an amazing experience the shows are very comfy and looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes but they run a size too big. I wear a size 7 in Nike and most other brands but these fit way too big.! I guess ill have to double up my socks I dont know what else to do. They are out of size 6
customer_reviews.author: Kealie M.

customer_reviews.title: Love pumas
customer_reviews.text: I think puma makes some of the best sneakers. They are comfortable. Look nice. They offer animal material free styles. The quality is top notch. I don’t know what more you could want. I have had these for several months and they still look brand new. I love ‘em
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for big feet.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment on the fit bit it’s a great looking shoe . My husband always wears size 13 but he couldn’t even get his foot into the shoe. The elasticized ankle was too small.
customer_reviews.author: 4everhawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove these shoes! Ordered a size 6 and they fit like a glove. These shoes make my legs look great and proportioned, they are not bulky looking which is a plus. They are just as pictured. Would definitely order from this seller again. *-*
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes, but size down!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! I ordered a 9 1/2 the first time which is my normally shoe size. I ended up selling them to a friend to order a smaller size. Because of how big they were I decided to go down to an 8 1/2. They're a lot better but I bet I could've even went down to an 8, I just didn't want to go thru the hassle of selling or returning them. But they are really comfortable!! My favorite tennis shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for my trainers to arrive... and when it finally did, it appears to be men's size. Theese did not fit true to size at all...HUGE! soooo disappointed and worse i'm in another country... i just gave them away. Now i have to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Kinda floppy
customer_reviews.text: I had my brother try the size 13 on because they looked very big. He wears a size 14-15, and the shoes were about a size longer than his foot. (To clarify: the shoes were for another person, but they looked larger than 13, so I needed a test drive to prove such). The soles were also detached from the bottom, which I did not expect. Overall, the shoe is sturdy and came clean. They had the actual PUMA box and logo.
customer_reviews.author: Joey g.

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be men sizes
customer_reviews.text: Way to big , actually 2 sizes to BIG Originally order a size 9 for women and here need a size 7 in women. But sneaker overall, very nice I give 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Ricaneagle787

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. wide toe box, super soft sole. I have chronic plantar fasciitis and these shoes make my feet actually feel good! On my feet all day and love them so much bought a 2nd pair for play
customer_reviews.author: apat44

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t taken these sneakers off. I am flat foot and most sneakers hurt my feet. I work in them and have another pair for exercising.
customer_reviews.author: CAtherine M.

customer_reviews.title: These are MEN sizes!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 7 or 7 1/2 in WOMENS sizes but I took every reviews advice and ordered a size lower. I bought a size 6 and it fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Very disapppinted...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shoe for my wife in size 8.5 womens as it is advertised as a women's shoe. Trying it after delivery revealed that it was actually sized as a mens 8.5. So I should have ordered a 7.... Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Runs about a size to big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size, and am finding it is half a size to a full size to big. They are extremely comfortable, and the quality is great, just runs big. I wear a 9-9 1/2 depending on manufacturer, ordered a 9 and they are still big.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Tooooo big - not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was as shown on picture but the sizing was completely off. The description says true to size but it wasn’t. I ordered a 7.5 and it was 1.5 sizes too big. It says it’s a female 7.5 but it was more like a males 7.5. Had to return - awaiting my refund. I would reorder if they had the correct size, super cute/comfy looking shoe. Upset it didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get your foot into shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are pretty comfortable, but they are very hard to get on. The opening is small, and there is no give.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Greatly priced shoe for a comfortable stride.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe, super comfortable. Not for wide feet. You can literally wear with no socks and never have sweaty feet because of how breathable they are. Would buy another pair. Only issue is they have not traction in any wet condition. I’ve nearly slipped off my porch multiple times when it’s wet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Cullum

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs larger than the size they say it is!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the fact that it wasn't stated that this shoe runs larger than the size stated! My Granddaughter's wears ab 8 but this shoe was bigger than any of her other size 8's!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Crocker - "Charlene"

customer_reviews.title: comfy but too big cuz its a mens i ordered wrong
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a womans due to the peach and black but its mens so they are too big BUT SUPER COMFY
customer_reviews.author: Nielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too big
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and they feel pretty comfortable! Ive only tried them on so far. I ordered my normal size and they are too big. I'm going to return these and get the next size down.
customer_reviews.author: taryn

customer_reviews.title: Run .5-1 size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous as expected and super comfy! Soo disappointed that they are way too big! I got 7.5 Because that’s my usual and they easily are more of an 8.5! Returning and giving it one more chance by ordering smaller size this time.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Ok but careful with size
customer_reviews.text: I always have been size 6 but this shoes were to big I don't know why? But the shoes were really cute and seems comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Hugo n' Anai

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run big!!
customer_reviews.text: My usual size is a 9. Knowing that’s different shows run different, I measured my foot according the size guide. It told me it would be my usual size so that’s what I ordered. Received them today and they are HUGE on me!! Definitely need to fix the size guide!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed new pair black shoes for work and saw these shoes at my local shoe store. Tried them out and they look great and feels incredibly comfortable. Bought these from Amazon because they sell it at a cheaper price than my local shoe store. These are my first pair of Puma shoes and I'm very satisfied. I'm looking forward to their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 in women in all athletic shoes. When I received these I was super impressed with the quality and comfort HOWEVER, they were enormous! They had to be more of a size 10 or 10 1/2 in women I had at least 3 inches in the toes area. We contacted the seller to get a return label and they were super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Second pair and I love them. Most comfortable shoe I have ever had. Will buy another pair for sure
customer_reviews.author: Jay C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love them but order a whole size down
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but they run SO big!! Definitely order a whole size down!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The bottoms were worn out extremely fast
customer_reviews.author: Anna~

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I highly recommend them. They are so nice to me and I just can't get over how comfortable they are. If mine get worn I'm definitely going to repurchase them.
customer_reviews.author: jody g

customer_reviews.title: Men’s sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Even though the description states that this is women’s sneakers, these are men’s sneakers. I ordered my size but since it’s men’s size and it’s huge! It says on the shoe and the box size 6/European 38.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Nat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and on point
customer_reviews.text: These are indeed mens sizes. They fit right and are comfortable. The color is fantastic and not overwhelming
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Slip on sneaker
customer_reviews.text: lol ok good and fit good. It’s a slide on shoe. Laces more for looks. I wear many slips in shoes and have a hand held shoe horn. You will need on to get shoe on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes ever!! Nice snug fit. Hug your feet like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Blaies

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but runs big
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and that there isn't a tongue that you have to mess with. I ordered my normal shoe size 8.5 but had to return them and get an 8. Still a little bit too big but I'm not going to mess with another return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were 2-3 sizes bigger than the indicated size
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I order 8 and half first its too big i return it for a size 8 and they send me another 8 and a half so i toss it aside waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Daydrie wilson

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than my $100 sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great fit super buy. More comfortable than my $100 Nike sneakers. I have worn Puma athletic shoes since the 60's and have always liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Acker

customer_reviews.title: Box labeled wrong for size.
customer_reviews.text: The tags on the box were “wrong” or the box was labeled wrong. I had two pairs of these sneakers before in different colors that is why I ordered 6.5. But when I tried these on they were huge, literally huge on me. I looked at the box and it said US 6.5 but UK 5.5 and it suppose to be UK 4.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R. Villicana

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes great price But!! It says 7.5 has to be 8.5 they fit big.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes. Even though the box was distorted shoes were amazingly comfy and looked great..
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It is comfortable, supportive and airy. If you are looking for a great fit with comfort then go with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size. A size too big.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the comments before purchasing. They are definitely a whole size too big. I wear a 9 truly and I ordered a 9. They are an entire size too big. I gave them to my daughter so I won’t be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: Not that great for wide feet. I’ve worn them at work and I have to keep one of them untied because there is to much pressure. Also I thought the insoles were going to be very cushioned but they aren’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jstudley23

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I loved this design but they were too big. I recommend buying 1 to 2 sizing down.
customer_reviews.author: Sds101

customer_reviews.title: The cut is different than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a sz.10 but was too roomy in toe area. Feel very light weight on feet. I decided to order a sz.9 in this shoe because they are nice And added a arch support system .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reid

customer_reviews.title: Sizes aren't true
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker sizes aren't accurate, I'm not sure what went wrong but i wear size 10, and this size 10 felt like 11 1/2. I sent them back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Adams

customer_reviews.title: bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them, Unfortunately, the size 7.5 was bigger than expected usual 7.5 . Since I m living outside of the United States I will not be able to return it. I would make a new purchase for a 7.0 size and resell the 7.5 received.
customer_reviews.author: just do it

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are wrong for US sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Not sized correctly for US sizes. Ordered a size 9 and came in as a size 10 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but runs big
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these and they were too big. Very comfy but two big. Still waiting on a refund and response from the seller. Very poor customer service which takes away from the value and comfort of the sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: SmileyDee

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are larger than actual size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 however they seem to have came a much larger size than that like a nine nine and a half the big
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cherney

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam is amazing. I could tell they were about to discontinue it because of the price, so I had to jump on it. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! And they arrived way earlier than predicted. I do think they run about half a size larger than expected, but over all, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pille

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: So cute but the fit is way off :( I also paid $15 for shipping and all I’m being refunded is what I paid in stead of being offered to be replaced with better size and now I’m going to have to pay for express again. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but I Ordered a size 6.5 in the shoe was literally two sizes too big. The label on the inside of the shoe read US 6.5 but it was still entirely too big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sized big
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. They are sized too big. I have a pair of the black n whites I bought in store a sz 8. Orderes these in a 8 which was more like a 9 1/2 maybe. I have returned two pairs now waiting on the third
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam liner makes these shoes really comfortable. Great looking too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sciabica

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get them for work, absolutely no traction. You will fall. Also the reviews said to get a size bigger, don’t. I did and now I have clown shoes 🙃
customer_reviews.author: kierstin lemmon-heard

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, fits comfortably however the sizing is way off. Bought a size 7 and I swear it’s a 7 in men’s not women. Keep that in mind when you place your order.
customer_reviews.author: Jounique C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe but size chart is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The size chart is so wrong, i chose size 8 (us) as it is equivalent to 38 euro size on the chart, when i received the item it turned out to be 40.5 euro size. But the shoe looks amazing i will order it again size 6 us hopefully it will fit this time
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft sole
customer_reviews.text: Love this PUMA! Sole is soft and comfy.I need to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sebuanoz Tattoo

customer_reviews.title: Great product and wonderful delivery timeing
customer_reviews.text: Love the these shoe's confertable beautiful colors was a lil too big but overall satisfied!!🙌💯
customer_reviews.author: Fidelia ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Heavy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so heavy, wore them for two hours and they’re so heavy. They’re really pretty but will update if I end up liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Ka Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Wear them every day!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! A little big, but they’re so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good looking abd fits well
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really liked these and they were a very good price
customer_reviews.author: GmaReis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe alot! Great arch support. Helps alot with my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.author: Kaden M.

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you buy new
customer_reviews.text: Received letter saying they weren’t shipped to customer due to damage of shoe
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a lot of comfort
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable for my walks, finally my feet are not crying afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: So these are way way to large ! And very bulky and returning them takes forever ! Better to just get pumas from a store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe looks good but doesnt provide much comfort.
customer_reviews.text: After standing around for about an hour, my feet started to hurt, and the next day, my right heel was in so much pain I couldn't put pressure on it.

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size is huge. At least 2 sizes bigger than marked

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Perfect for everyday use. Mother on the go. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: STACY JONES

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9, so I ordered a size 9. They fit way to big and had to return them. They were a whole size big! But they were super comfy! And so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Cady

customer_reviews.title: men's size
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is very big, the size I ordered was for women, they sent a men's size, and it is too big to wear
customer_reviews.author: Jhosibel

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I got these a little to big but it’s ok love these
customer_reviews.author: Stephani Butler

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9 and clearly got a 10 or 10.5. Returned item for credit
customer_reviews.author: Azizah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe the design is beautiful and the shoe fits great, the soles and inner lining support the foot as well as cushions each and every step!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lebedeck

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I love them by far the best pair of shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved them !
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these 10000%%%% great product and even better price!
customer_reviews.author: De3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe For My Foot
customer_reviews.text: I sought out these specific shoes because I realized after a 2 month long trip abroad, walking ~5 miles per day, my feet were never sore. Had to buy them again. May just be the perfect shoe for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger fit
customer_reviews.text: These Pumas remind you of KSwiss, I wear an 11 and they fit almost like a 11 1/2. But overall they are comfortable and great breathable material.
customer_reviews.author: Phillisha rogers

customer_reviews.title: They run big
customer_reviews.text: They nice but huge! I’m normally a size 7 they fit like a 8
customer_reviews.author: Isa lopes

customer_reviews.title: Way to big
customer_reviews.text: How to give them to my mom he wears a 9 I ordered a 7 1/2 way to big
customer_reviews.author: Niccole

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and fix as expected. Bought these ones for work but will order another color to go with my soft jogger pants. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DEANGELO GILBERT

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run big
customer_reviews.text: Sizes seem to run big. My child currently wears size 8.5 but still growing so ordered a size 9, they were way too big. We returned them for 8.5 and still a bit big. Other than that, quick on receiving and even quick for refund on returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller than you are.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe however I ordered a size 8 and it’s more like a size 9.5. They are way way to big for me.
customer_reviews.author: tracy brady

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes! Fit perfectly and looked exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: kata

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I've gotten plenty of compliments on the looks by many people, from young sneaker heads to seniors. Comfy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: K Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable sneakers
customer_reviews.text: A little tighter than expected but the sneakers are really confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Gomez

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Pacer Next Cage Sneaker
product_meta.description: The pacer next cage is a new and progressive street running inspired sneaker with a sock construction upper for a snug fit. The air mesh upper enhances breathability whereas the TPU cage provides lateral and medial support for your foot. The contemporary midsole design and a soft compound deliver premium cushioning. A durable rugged rubber outsole ensures best traction and grip for the everyday usage.
